about_the_game:
The RIDE 5 - Born to Race Pack includes:
  • BMW M 1000 RR - Racing Modified (2023)
  • Ducati 1299 Superleggera (2017)
  • Honda CBR 600RR HRC (2021)
  • Honda CBR 600RR HRC - Racing Modified (2021)
  • MV Agusta Brutale 1000 RR - Racing Modified (2021)
  • Track: Vallelunga

As the name suggests, the Born to Race Pack includes motorcycles specifically built to shine on tracks such as the Vallelunga, one of Italy's most modern circuits!

Based on the S 1000 RR sport bike, the BMW M 1000 RR Racing Modified makes a further qualitative leap in terms of performance, reaching a maximum speed of 314 km/h with its use of carbon.
The hypernaked bike MV Agusta Brutale 1000 RR is the same, with 219 horsepower at 13,000 rpm and the aggressiveness of a Racing Modified, as well as the 1299 Superleggera with a twin-cylinder engine – making it one of the Ducati house's most powerful bikes, with only 500 samples produced.
Another rarity is the Honda CBR 600RR HRC, only available in Japan and designed specifically to compete in Supersport, along with its Racing Modified version, which is even more extreme!

This DLC is included in the RIDE 5 - Season Pass.
detailed_description:
The RIDE 5 - Born to Race Pack includes:
  • BMW M 1000 RR - Racing Modified (2023)
  • Ducati 1299 Superleggera (2017)
  • Honda CBR 600RR HRC (2021)
  • Honda CBR 600RR HRC - Racing Modified (2021)
  • MV Agusta Brutale 1000 RR - Racing Modified (2021)
  • Track: Vallelunga

As the name suggests, the Born to Race Pack includes motorcycles specifically built to shine on tracks such as the Vallelunga, one of Italy's most modern circuits!

Based on the S 1000 RR sport bike, the BMW M 1000 RR Racing Modified makes a further qualitative leap in terms of performance, reaching a maximum speed of 314 km/h with its use of carbon.
The hypernaked bike MV Agusta Brutale 1000 RR is the same, with 219 horsepower at 13,000 rpm and the aggressiveness of a Racing Modified, as well as the 1299 Superleggera with a twin-cylinder engine – making it one of the Ducati house's most powerful bikes, with only 500 samples produced.
Another rarity is the Honda CBR 600RR HRC, only available in Japan and designed specifically to compete in Supersport, along with its Racing Modified version, which is even more extreme!

This DLC is included in the RIDE 5 - Season Pass.

short_description: Fast, powerful and extreme: collect bikes specifically designed for track use with RIDE 5 - Born to Race Pack and let loose on the Vallelunga circuit!
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian*, German, Spanish - Spain*, Japanese*, Portuguese - Brazil*, Simplified Chinese*, Traditional Chinese*, Indonesian
*languages with full audio support
